SelectAll: SELECT pm.PaymentMethodKey,pm.PaymentMethodName,pm.IsActive,pm.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimPaymentMethod pm ORDER BY pm.PaymentMethodName
UpdateRow: UPDATE dimPaymentMethod pm SET pm.PaymentMethodName = ?, pm.IsActive = ?, pm.LastUpdatedDate = NOW() WHERE pm.PaymentMethodKey = ?
InsertRow: INSERT INTO dimPaymentMethod (PaymentMethodKey, PaymentMethodName, IsActive, LastUpdatedDate) VALUES (?, ?, ?, NOW())
GetRowWithKey: SELECT pm.PaymentMethodKey, pm.PaymentMethodName, pm.IsActive, pm.LastUpdatedDate FROM dimPaymentMethod pm WHERE pm.PaymentMethodKey = ?
